2. **Use the hotel's mobile app**: If the Hilton Hotel has a mobile app, you can download it and use it to request additional amenities, including extra pillows. Follow the in-app instructions to submit your request.
3. **Visit the front desk in person**: Take a quick trip down to the lobby and let the front desk staff know you need an extra pillow. They'll be happy to assist you.

If you need any further assistance or have any other requests, feel free to ask!
